original_text: The waters continued to recede until the tenth month, and on the first day of the tenth month the tops of the mountains became visible.
korean_text: 물이 점점 줄어들어 열째 달 곧 그 달 초하룻날에 산들의 봉우리가 보였더라

sentences.original_text: and on the first day of the tenth month
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 열 번째 달 첫째 날에

sentences.original_text: the tops of the mountains became visible
